name: node-browser-shim-gap
description: The gap issue between Node.js and Browser shims.

scripts.build:browserify: npm run clean && browserify test/test.js -o test/build/browserify-test.js
scripts.build:webpack: npm run clean && webpack test/test.js test/build/webpack-test.js
scripts.test: npm run test:node; npm run test:webpack; npm run test:browserify
scripts.test:browserify: npm run build:browserify && mocha-chrome test/browserify-test.html || true
scripts.test:webpack: npm run build:webpack && mocha-chrome test/webpack-test.html || true

author: azu
